spiralAnalysis.breakthroughInsight: Realizing domain understanding is the actual blocker

domainAnalysis.recommendation:
TECHNICAL IS PRIMARY BLOCKER.

Required Action: Build proof-of-concept to validate technical assumptions.

Technical challenge: Core architecture

Approach:
1. Identify 1-2 critical technical assumptions
2. Build 1-session POC to validate
3. Use POC findings for full architecture
4. Proceed with confidence
domainAnalysis.smeType: Subject matter expert in blockchain, consciousness

actionPriority.action: Build 1-session POC for each high-risk assumption
Design full architecture based on POC learnings

Recommended: Build quick 1-session POC for each before full commitment.
Time investment: 1-2 weeks

integrationAnalysis.recommendation:
INTEGRATION COMPLEXITY ANALYSIS

Components Average: 9/10
Integration Complexity: 10/10
Multiplier Effect: ×1.75

Underestimation Warning: You will likely underestimate integration by 1 points (11%).

Why This Happens:
- Components can be built independently
- Integration reveals hidden coupling/state issues
- Testing integration is harder than testing components
- Edge cases emerge at integration boundaries

Impact: Typical integration takes 111% longer than estimated.

recommended.name: Integration Layer First
recommended.description: Design integration architecture BEFORE building components

recommended.name: State Management Upfront
recommended.description: Define how components share state before implementation

alternatives.name: Contract Testing
alternatives.description: Define component contracts early, test integration points

alternatives.name: Staged Integration
alternatives.description: Integrate one component at a time, test thoroughly

sideProjectAnalysis.triggerCondition: When main project blocked for 3-4+ sessions without breakthrough
sideProjectAnalysis.expectedOutput: Knowledge artifact applicable to main project + 2-3 future projects
sideProjectAnalysis.roi: 3-5x (each side project unlocks multiple future projects)
sideProjectAnalysis.recommendation:
No high-severity blockers detected.

Side projects are optional but recommended when:
- Main project progression slows (stalled for 3-4+ sessions)
- A specific technical challenge needs deep exploration
- Cross-cutting knowledge could benefit multiple projects

When ready, create focused 1-2 week side project to advance knowledge.

frameworkAnalysis.recommendation:
First project analysis!

Framework Prediction: Emerging framework will validate Magnus 14 patterns.

Recommendation:
- Document every decision and outcome
- Note when spiral counts deviate from predictions
- Track what assumptions hold true vs surprise you
- Use learnings to refine Magnus 14 for next project

After this project: You'll have data to validate/refine Magnus 14 accuracy.
